description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to mitigate the negative effects of the 2012 drought by helping maintain the corn and wheat productive capability and prevent livestock de-stocking of farmers in the most affected districts.

comment.narrative: Indicator overachieved. For 2014 the preliminary number is an explosive 97.5%.

title.narrative: Percentage change over the 2009-11 average national production of wheat

comment.narrative: Indicator overachieved. Furthermore, preliminary data for 2014 indicates a 45% increase.

title.narrative: Percentage change over the 2009-11 average national production of corn

comment.narrative: Indicator overachieved. Furthermore, preliminary data for 2014 indicates a steady 4% increase. The Actual (Previous) number wascalculated erroneously.
Indicator overachieved. For 2014 the number is a strong 38%.
